en_US.name: Mirroring
en_US.description: Mimics behavior or speech patterns to build rapport and facilitate communication in interpersonal interactions.

en_US.name: Kitting
en_US.description: Process of organizing and preparing items for assembly or shipping, requiring attention to detail and inventory management.

en_US.name: DSI
en_US.description: Involves extracting insights from large datasets and applying machine learning algorithms in data science and intelligent systems.

en_US.name: Physical Verification
en_US.description: Proficient in using various techniques such as inspections, testing, and measurements to ensure the accuracy and integrity of physical objects or data.

en_US.name: Laser Scanning
en_US.description: Proficient in using laser scanning technology to capture and analyze 3D data to support a range of applications, including engineering, architecture, and industrial design.
